item.title: Make .CSV file using MySQL and Python
item.description: In this blog, I am going to show how to develop an application by which we can make .csv files from MySQL database using Python.|||||||||| Steps SQL command Now, let us start by getting data from Database. Lets say we have a DB names csv_test and it contains a table named test with fields id and name, and for testing purpose let us have some values inserted into it like this:
